name: Rolling the ball game
description:
YUP, THIS IS THE GAME!

A funny game about two balls in love, one has gone missing and the other is trying to search for it but he really gets to forget about things. It's kind a parody of other games of this type. But its unique because it has abilities and its moderately hard! :)

CONTROLS:

A for left

D for right

E for back in time (It goes few seconds back in time)

F for slow mode (time moves slower)

BUGS

Unfortunately there are some. 

In-game audio options are bugged - they dont work properly. So i advise you to turn down/off audio in audio mixer in windows. 

Sometimes when you pick level from level picker level won't start, to fix that issue you can click ESC or P to pause again and again ESC or P or resume to resume the game. 

Sorry for any inconvinience I will look into that!

PS. Game is totaly free and there is no ads, simply because its just funny little game.

Feel free to rate, post comments or/and questions!
